overview:
Popschau is a premium online video show reviewing powerful content from the leading online magazines & publishers across categories such as Art, Design, Fashion, and Culture.

In Videos under 3 minutes in length, the weekly publication presents you 10 selected videos, representing contemporary culture, published the previous week.

The service allows you to browse through your favorite categories and customize your own channel.

Taking into consideration today’s busy schedules, Popschau is the optimal way to inform yourself about what interests you in a short period of time.
